description: This is the source code for a web-based database viewer interface, comprising HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to manage database selection and data display.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by re-fetching data.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates an HTML table to display data rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual data cell, handling special formats and expandable content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for wide or complex data.
